Articles.Content:
In 2003, the Japanese Probe "Hayabusa" launched to the asteroid "Itokawa". In 2014, Hayabus 2 will launch towards the Asteroid "(162173) 1999 JU3". As I haven't got any Asteroids in KSP, and Minmus is just aweful and to big, I went to Gilly.

The Craft File

Launch with Japanese H2-A Launch Vehicle.

The Probe at Gilly
Hi Just a note Hayabusa Launched from a M-V rocket looks like this https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:M-V_with_Astro-E_satellite.jpg
